title: Microsoft bookshelf '94 (PC)
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Children's encyclopedias and dictionaries
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Encyclopedias and dictionaries
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Research - Study and teaching
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
description: A compendium of reference material that includes the American Heritage Dictionary; the Roget's Thesaurus; Colombia Dictionary of Quotations; the Concise Columbia Encyclopedia; Hammond World Atlas; the People's Chronology; and the World Almanac. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Multimedia PC or compatible with 386SX or higher microprocessor; 4 Mb of memory; 2 Mb of hard-disk space; CD-Rom drive; audio board; VGA display; Microsoft Windows operating system version 3.1 or later.
